DataElement.preferredName: Actinic Keratosis Cryotherapy Treatment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator that describes whether actinic keratosis was treated with cryotherapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A precancerous lesion of the skin composed of atypical keratinocytes. It is characterized by the presence of thick, scaly patches of skin. Several histologic variants have been described, including atrophic, acantholytic, and hyperkeratotic variants.:The therapeutic use of cold or refrigeration in medicine._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A precancerous lesion of the skin composed of atypical keratinocytes. It is characterized by the presence of thick, scaly patches of skin. Several histologic variants have been described, including atrophic, acantholytic, and hyperkeratotic variants.

Concepts.definition: A precancerous lesion of the skin composed of atypical keratinocytes. It is characterized by the presence of thick, scaly patches of skin. Several histologic variants have been described, including atrophic, acantholytic, and hyperkeratotic variants.

Property.preferredDefinition: The therapeutic use of cold or refrigeration in medicine._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: The therapeutic use of cold or refrigeration in medicine.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
